mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SEARCHECO_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, BRAND_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(#{fileNo}, #{brandNo}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, #{fileLevel})
mapper.update: UPDATE SEARCHECO_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE ECO_BOARD_NO = #{bno} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT S.ECO_BOARD_TITLE , S.ECO_BOARD_CONTENT , S.COUNT , S.ECO_BOARD_NO , B.BRAND_URL , S.CREATE_DATE FROM SEARCHECO_BOARD S JOIN BRAND B USING(BRAND_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND S.ECO_BOARD_NO = #{bno}
